tool_description: Validates joint angle trajectories against position, velocity, and acceleration limits to ensure robot safety.

joint_positions.description: Joint positions to check as flattened array

joint_velocities.description: Joint velocities to check as flattened array

joint_accelerations.description: Joint accelerations to check as flattened array

num_joints.description: Number of joints in the robot

position_limits_min.description: Minimum position limits for each joint

position_limits_max.description: Maximum position limits for each joint

velocity_limits.description: Maximum velocity limits for each joint

acceleration_limits.description: Maximum acceleration limits for each joint

safety_margin.description: Safety margin as fraction of limit (0.0 to 0.2)

error_messages: Array size mismatch: joint_positions length must be divisible by num_joints.
Limit array mismatch: position_limits_min and position_limits_max must each have num_joints elements.
Velocity array mismatch: If provided, joint_velocities length must be divisible by num_joints.
Invalid safety margin: safety_margin must be between 0.0 and 0.2.
Inconsistent limits: position_limits_min values must be less than position_limits_max values.
usage: Provide joint_positions, num_joints, position limits, and optional velocity/acceleration data with their limits. Returns violation analysis.

position_violations.description: Position limit violations for each trajectory point

velocity_violations.description: Velocity limit violations for each trajectory point

violation_details.description: Detailed violation descriptions for each point
